Five members of this family ( MYC , <extra_id_0> SCL <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TAL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> LYL-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> E2A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) are implicated in oncogenic events in human lymphoid tumors because of their consistent involvement in chromosomal translocations .
